name: Degrees of Freedom
description:
Tempy the thermometer wants out of the meat factory! Help him fight off hordes of meat using the arrow keys! Submit your name to the leaderboards to show off your high score!

Leaderboard resets every Wednesday.

Assets Used:

https://soundimage.org/looping-music/

https://henrysoftware.itch.io/pixel-food

https://freesound.org/people/janbezouska/sounds/399183/

https://just-a-cookie.itch.io/idnustrial-platformer-asset-pack

https://www.1001fonts.com/arcadeclassic-font.html
